name: Map
description: Use entity GIS coordinates to plot the location of the entity in Google Maps.

name: Timeline
description: Use entity dates to plot the lifetime of the entity.

name: Network display
description: Display an RDF graph using its network representation.

name: Full text search
description: Use Lucene to return a list of entities containing specific text.

name: SPARQL query
description: Use SPARQL commands to find entities with specific properties or relationships.

name: Date query
description: Find entities with a date within a certain data range

name: Location query
description: Find entities with a location within a certain location range

name: Relationship query
description: Find people related to a specified person

name: Import people from friend-of-a-friend
description: Find people specified people in the friend-of-a-friend database and import them into the selected project.

name: Import a CSV file
description: Select a CSV file on the desktop and import it into the selected project.

name: Export a CSV file
description: Create a CSV file on the desktop and derive its contents from the selected project.

name: Data entry
description: Create an entity, fill in its fields and save it in the selected project.

name: Data modification
description: Select an an entity in the selected project, change its fields and save it.

name: Report on people
description: Count the number of people in the triple store.
